title: Disclaimer - Purist Natural Medicine
cleaned_text: Last Updated and Effective as of July 6, 2020. Please read this Disclaimer carefully before you start to use [puristnaturalmedicine.com](https://puristnaturalmedicine.com) (the "Website"). By visiting this Website, you accept and agree to be bound and abide by the terms of this Disclaimer, whether or not you have read it. This Website is owned and operated by Purist Naturopathic Medicine Corp. doing business as Purist Natural Medicine ("Purist Natural Medicine," "we," "our" or "us"). This Disclaimer, along with the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy of the Website, governs your access to and use of the Website, including any functionality, content, products or services offered on or through the Website. The term "you" refers to the user or viewer of the Website. By visiting, using, viewing, or accessing the Website or using, viewing, accessing or purchasing any of its content, products or services, or otherwise signing up to receive any of Purist Natural Medicine's emails, newsletter, social media posts and or any other content or services, or by purchasing any products from the Website, you accept and agree to be bound by and abide by this Disclaimer. If you do not want to agree to this Disclaimer, our Terms & Conditions or our Privacy Policy, you must not access, view or use the Website. Changes to Disclaimer We reserve our right to change, modify or update this Disclaimer at any time in our sole discretion, in which case we'll update the Effective Date of the Disclaimer located at the top of this Disclaimer page to reflect the date of the changes. All changes are effective immediately when we post them and apply to all access to and use of the Website and its contents, products and services thereafter. By continuing to use the Website after we post any such changes, you accept and agree to be bound by the Disclaimer as modified, so please check this Disclaimer from time to time to be aware of any modifications. Information on Website for Educational And Informational Purposes Only and Not Medical, Health or Professional Advice This Website has been created to provide information about our naturopathic and functional medicine services; however, any information found on this Website is for educational and informational purposes only and is NOT intended as, and must not be understood or construed as, medical care or advice for any person or naturopathic medical care or advice for any person, including patients of Purist Natural Medicine. Nothing on this Website is intended to substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The information on the Website is general information and education and is not intended as, and must not be understood as, the practice of medicine, or the practice of counseling care including, without limitation, psychiatry, psychology, psychotherapy, or providing any form of medical diagnosis, treatment, cure or prevention of any disease. For purposes of clarification, naturopathic and functional medical services (the "Naturopathic Medical Services") are offered by Purist Natural Medicine to individuals located in California in-person and via telemedicine after they register as patients of Purist Natural Medicine. While the Website may advertise the Naturopathic Medical Services, no Naturopathic Medical Services are provided via this Website or its contents and visiting this Website does not create a doctor-patient relationship between you and Dr. Kendall Perrine, ND or any doctor at Purist Natural Medicine. While there may be a link to the Purist Natural Medicine HIPAA-compliant patient portal for Naturopathic Medicine Services on this Website, the patient portal is hosted on a separate server and is not part of this Website. While Dr. Kendall Perrine, ND, the owner of Purist Natural Medicine, is a naturopathic medical doctor, any information you read on the Website is not a substitute for medical or health advice from a licensed medical or health care professional who has knowledge of the facts and circumstances of your individual situation. If you have any concerns or questions about your health, you should always consult one-on-one with a licensed medical or health care professional. If you are in California you can reach out to Purist Natural Medicine to learn more about becoming a patient of Purist Natural Medicine. However your use of the Website DOES NOT create a doctor-patient relationship between you and any doctor at Purist Natural Medicine. Purist Natural Medicine expressly recommends that you seek advice from a licensed medical or health care professional who has knowledge of the facts and circumstances of your individual situation. You are responsible for your own physical, mental and emotional well-being, decisions, choices, actions and results. Purist Natural Medicine disclaims any liability for your reliance on any opinions or advice contained in this Website. Neither Purist Natural Medicine nor any of its owners, officers, employees, contractors, affiliates or suppliers shall be held liable or responsible for any errors or omissions on this Website or for any damage you may suffer as a result of failing to seek medical or health advice from a licensed medical or health care professional who has knowledge of the facts and circumstances of your individual situation. Information and statements on or in this Website and its contents regarding dietary supplements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Products sold on or through this Website are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Always consult your physician or other licensed medical or health care professional before taking any medication or nutritional, herbal or homeopathic supplement, using any treatment for a health problem, undertaking any diet, exercise or other health program or making any medical or lifestyle changes. Not Professional Advice The Website and its contents are NOT intended as, and shall not be understood or construed as, professional advice. While the owner of Purist Natural Medicine is a professional, and the information provided on or in this Website relates to issues within Purist Natural Medicine's area of professionalism, such information is not a substitute for advice from a professional who is aware of the facts and circumstances of your individual situation. While we have done our best to ensure that the information in the Website is accurate and provides valuable information, we expressly recommend that you seek advice from a professional who has knowledge of the facts and circumstances of your individual situation. Neither Purist Natural Medicine nor any of its owners, officers, employees, contractors, affiliates or suppliers shall be held liable or responsible for any errors or omissions on or in this Website, its Contents, Products and/or Services or for any damage you may suffer as a result of failing to seek competent advice from a professional who is has knowledge of your individual situation. User's Personal Responsibility We have done our best to ensure that the Website and its contents are accurate and provide valuable information, but we cannot guarantee the accuracy of such information. Neither Purist Natural Medicine nor any of its owners, officers, employees, affiliates or contractors are responsible for any errors or omissions on or in this Website or for any damage you may suffer as a result of failing to seek competent advice from a professional who is familiar with your situation. By accessing this Website and its contents in any way, you accept personal responsibility for the results of your actions. Purist Natural Medicine is not responsible for your personal actions or choices before, during or after use of our Website. Notwithstanding any limitations by law, your use, misuse or non-use of any information on this Website is at your own risk, and you agree to take full responsibility for any harm or damage you suffer as a result of your use, misuse or non-use, of the information available on or in this Website and to absolve Purist Natural Medicine of any liability or loss that you, your business, or your family, children or heirs (if applicable) or any other person, may incur. No Guarantees You agree that Purist Natural Medicine has not made any guarantees about the results of taking any action, whether recommended on or in this Website or not. This Website provides educational and informational resources that are intended to help users of this Website succeed in health or otherwise. You nevertheless recognize that your ultimate success or failure will be the result of your own efforts, your particular situation, and innumerable other circumstances beyond the control and/or knowledge of Purist Natural Medicine and any individuals associated with Purist Natural Medicine. You also recognize that prior results do not guarantee a similar outcome. Thus, the results obtained by others - whether clients of Purist Natural Medicine or otherwise - applying the principles set out in this Website, its contents, products and/or services are no guarantee that you or any other person or entity will be able to obtain similar results. Testimonials At various places on this Website you may find testimonials from clients and patients of services offered on or in this Website or by Purist Natural Medicine. The testimonials are actual statements made by clients and/or patients of Purist Natural Medicine and have been truthfully conveyed on or in this Website. Although these testimonials are truthful statements about results obtained by these clients and/or patients, they do not guarantee or promise in any way that you might achieve the same outcome as each situation varies. You specifically recognize and agree that the testimonials are not a guarantee of results that you or anyone else will obtain by using the Website or other services of Purist Natural Medicine. Errors And Omissions This World Wide Web is a public resource of general information that is intended, but not promised or guaranteed, to be correct, complete, and up-to-date. We have taken reasonable steps to ensure that the information contained on or in this Website is accurate, but we cannot represent that this Website and its contents are free of errors. You accept that the information contained on or in this may be erroneous and agree to conduct due diligence to verify any information obtained from this Website prior to taking any action. You expressly agree not to rely upon any information contained on or in this Website. Disclosures and Affiliate Links This Website is written and edited by Purist Natural Medicine. Purist Natural Medicine believes in honesty. As noted on the Supplements page of the Website, Purist Natural Medicine may receive a commission if you purchase products from our online supplement dispensary retailers Fullscript and Wellevate. If we link to or offer any other content, products or services for which we receive a commission we will provide an applicable disclosure near such link or offer content. As a policy, Purist Natural Medicine will only affiliate with products, services, coaches, consultants, and other experts that we believe will provide value to our customers and followers. Even though we may receive compensation, we always give our honest opinions, findings, beliefs, or experiences on those topics or products. With respect to Fullscript and Wellevate specifically, we choose to provide this service so that we know you are receiving the highest quality products that are not contaminated and contain therapeutic levels of the ingredients they are supposed to contain from manufacturers who have gained our confidence through considerable research and experience. While we are committed to only affiliating with products and services we believe will provide value, we make no warranties, guarantees, or representations as to the effectiveness or safety of said products or services or to statements of such third parties. As a visitor of the Website, you recognize that it remains your personal responsibility to investigate whether any such products or services are right for your personal circumstances and whether they will benefit you. You will not rely on any recommendation, reference, or information provided by us on this Website but will instead conduct your own investigation and will rely upon your investigation to decide whether to purchase the product or service. Any product claim, statistic, quote or other representation about a product or service may have been provided to Purist Natural Medicine by a third party and you should verify it with the manufacturer, provider or party in question before relying on it. No Warranties TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, THE WEBSITE AND ALL INFORMATION ON AND IN THE WEBSITE, AND ITS CONTENT, PRODUCTS AND SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. PURIST NATURAL MEDICINE MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, ABOUT THE ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS, RELIABILITY, AVAILABILITY, TIMELINESS, SUITABILITY AND APPROPRIATENESS OF OUR WEBSITE AND ITS CONTENTS FOR ANY PURPOSE.
